name: Easy Solutions
overview:
Easy Solutions Inc. provides technology security solutions to financial, telecommunications, and e-commerce sectors, as well as government institutions. It focuses on electronic fraud threats, such as phishing, pharming, and social engineering attacks. The company helps protect online businesses and enterprise applications from phishing attacks, online credential theft, and Internet fraud threats. Its solutions include DetectID, a device ID authentication solution that captures hardware specific information to feed the algorithm to define a device fingerprint; DetectTA, a transaction anomaly detection solution that works at the transaction level by authorizing or denying in real time transactions; and DetectID Web Authenticator, which provides protection to control access to critical applications across the enterprise. The company also provides Detect Safe Browsing, a tool to protect end-users from modalities of online banking fraud, such as phishing or pharming; and Detect ATM, a solution against electronic fraud in ATMs that offers monitoring and gives alerts when suspicious activity is found in any element of the system. In addition, it offers security services, including detect monitoring, detect vulnerability scanning, detect professional, and detect training and certification services.

The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Sunrise, Florida.
